1.8.1.0.0-beta4: * Fix crash when holding a grass slab.
1.8.1.0.0-beta3:
* Add keybindings to switch the trowel's block type, fixes #3.
    * Change the way the trowel consumes blocks to be more smart, fixes #10.
    * Fix block breaking particles not having textures, fixes #7.
    * Fix crash when placing blocks, fixes #13.
    * Fix crash when looking up the recipe for the double slabs.
    * Fix blocks dropping items when breaking them in creative mode, fixes #9.
    * Fix silk touching blocks and their drops, fixes #8.
    * Fix the trowel not respecting the top/side/bottom textures of materials, fixes #6.
1.8.1.0.0-beta2:
* Fix grass slabs not having a name and creative tab.
    * Fix the trowel not placing the blocks client-side, fixes #4.
    * Fix crash when running on servers, fixes #5.
    * Fix blocks third-person rendering size.
1.8.1.0.3: * Fix crash when using forge versions higher than 1521.
1.8.1.1.2:
* Fix crash when a grass slab is destroyed by an explosion.
    * Fix the grass slab item having the wrong name.
    * Fix more culling bugs in the stairs.
    * Fix crash when starting a server on Windows.
1.8.1.0.4:
* Add materials for the stone variants and the prismarine blocks, fixes #21.
    * Fix vertical slabs culling when placed next to each other, fixes #18.
1.8.1.0.0:
* Improve face culling, fixes #1.
    * Fix material loading when running on servers, fixes #14.
    * Fix the particles when running on a block being the missing texture.
1.8.1.0.1:
* Remove usage of javax.vecmath which is not available on servers, fixes #15.
    * Fix crash when placing a double slab blcok next to a slab block, fixes #16.
1.8.1.1.0:
* Add a portable ladder block.
    * Add materials for coarse dirt, podzol and mycelium, fixes #25.
    * Add compatibility for thaumcraft blocks.
    * Add fence and fence gate block types.
    * Add a GUI for the trowel when you shift-right click on the air, fixes #23.
    * Add a model for the trowel.
    * Reduced significantly the blocks' space usage on disk and made it able to better handle removing/adding materials from existing worlds.
    * Blocks now have the block hardness and explosion resistance of their material.
    * Fix grass slabs world gen generating chunks recursively, fixes #22.
1.8.1.0.2:
* Reduce memory usage in the grass slabs world gen.
    * Fix glass slabs making the sides of other slabs next to them invisible, fixes #17.
    * Fix crash when you place a wall on top of another wall.
    * Fix not being able to place torches on top of walls.
1.8.1.1.1:
* Fix startup crash on windows.
    * Fix invisible faces on stairs when stacked on top of each other.

1.9.1.9-1.4.3:
* Update to Minecraft 1.9.
    * Add materials for end bricks, purpur block and purpur pillar.
    * Fix the material bag losing it's material.
    * Fix wall posts not having textures when using resourcepacks, fixes #40.

1.8.8.1.8.8-1.1.2:
* Fix crash when a grass slab is destroyed by an explosion.
    * Fix the grass slab item having the wrong name.
    * Fix more culling bugs in the stairs.
    * Fix crash when starting a server on Windows.
1.8.8.1.8.8-1.1.0:
* Add a portable ladder block.
    * Add materials for coarse dirt, podzol and mycelium, fixes #25.
    * Add compatibility for thaumcraft blocks.
    * Add fence and fence gate block types.
    * Add a GUI for the trowel when you shift-right click on the air, fixes #23.
    * Add a model for the trowel.
    * Updated to Minecraft Forge version 1.8.8.
    * Reduced significantly the blocks' space usage on disk and made it able to better handle removing/adding materials from existing worlds.
    * Blocks now have the block hardness and explosion resistance of their material.
    * Fix grass slabs world gen generating chunks recursively, fixes #22.
1.8.8.1.8.8-1.1.1:
* Fix startup crash on windows.
    * Fix invisible faces on stairs when stacked on top of each other.

1.8.9.1.8.9-1.3.3: * Fix items converting when shift-clicking between containers.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.4.2:
* Fix crash when disabling the generateBlocks config option, fixes #39.
    * Fix crash when opening the trowel/material bag gui.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.4.3:
* Fix the material bag losing it's material.
    * Fix wall posts not having textures when using resourcepacks, fixes #40.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.2.0:
* Add a Material Bag item that can hold 27 stacks of blocks of a single material, which the trowel can use as a source of materials.
    * Add: blocks now combine with themselves if possible when being placed (i.e. placing a step next to another one will convert into a slab), fixes #11.
    * Add keybindings for the trowel to directly select block types (by default numpad 0 = full block, numpad 1 = stairs, numpad 2 = slab, etc.), fixes #24.
    * Add a validation of the material id mapping of the clients when they connect to servers, fixes #28.
    * Fix portable ladder not having localization.
    * Fix portable ladder not having a texture for the break particles.
    * Fix the trowel not showing the binded block in the item model.
    * Fix localization issue with the double stone slabs.
    * Fix blocks being consumed by the trowel binding recipe.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.2.1:
* Fix crash when placing a grass slab on top of another grass slab, fixes #32.
    * Fix NPE sometimes when a player connects to a server, fixes #31.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.3.0:
* Add config option to show binded trowels for all materials in the creative tab.
    * Add compatibility with Biomes O' Plenty.
    * Add compatibility with AdobeBlocks.
    * Add a config option to replace the grass texture with a long grass texture, fixes #26.
    * Add config option to disable the generation of the missing blocks for materials.
    * Add command to generate material json files.
    * Add the ability for the trowel to use any item with an ItemHandler capability as source of material and implement the ItemHandler capability in the material bag.
    * Material bags now insert items as you pick them up from the ground.
    * Allow materials to be loaded from a sub directory of the configuration directory.
    * Improve the material bag inventory handling, fixes a dupe bug with it.
    * Fix oclussion issue with transparent stairs and slabs.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.3.1: * Fix crash on server startup, fixes #33.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.4.0:
* Add a way to generate materials for dyed blocks and add stained glass materials.
    * Add the ability to override/add recipes in the material json, and change the recipe for glass walls, fixes #35.
    * Add pane block type.
    * Add config option to show/hide the generated blocks in the creative tab.
    * Deprecated the material id mapping, it was an overengineered solution to a non-problem. DO NOT remove the config file "config/BuildingBricks/material_ids.nbt", it is needed to convert the worlds.
    * Fix crash when breaking blocks, fixes #36.
    * Fix some blocks having a missing textrure in the bottom side.
    * Fix glass blocks not dropping when harvested with silk touch.
    * Fix compatibility issue in the trowel binding recipe.
1.8.9.1.8.9-1.3.2: * Fix stairs crafting recipe giving only 2 stairs in stead of 4.
